price: ពួកគេបាននិយាយថាៈ ពួកយើងនឹងព្យាយាមសុំពីឪពុក របស់គេ ឱ្យគេ(មកជាមួយពួកយើង) ហើយពួកយើងពិតជាធ្វើ បាន។
arabic: قَالُواْ سَنُرَٰوِدُ عَنۡهُ أَبَاهُ وَإِنَّا لَفَٰعِلُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: qālū sanurāwidu ʿanhu abāhu wa-innā lafāʿilūna
translations: We will try to get permission
